---
name: Improve Admin UI (rich editor & templates)
about: Replace simple static UI with admin templates and a rich text editor
---

### Summary

Replace the simple static UI with an admin UI (templates or SPA), integrate a rich text editor (CKEditor) for content management, and add responsive styling.

### Acceptance Criteria

- Admin UI for managing activities, members, subscriptions, and invoices
- Integrate CKEditor (or similar) for rich content editing
- Responsive styles and improved UX for admin pages

### Notes

Keep the initial UI server-rendered with templates to reduce frontend complexity.
